data.name: SwipeHint
data.value: Swipe to move, Tap for bomb

data.name: RemoveAdsDescription
data.value: Remove all ads and support development

data.name: ResetProgressMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all level progress? This cannot be undone.

data.name: ResetProgressConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all level progress? This cannot be undone.

data.name: ClearScoresMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear all high scores? This cannot be undone.

data.name: ClearScoresConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear all high scores? This cannot be undone.

data.name: ScoresClearedMessage
data.value: All high scores have been cleared.

data.name: PremiumActivated
data.value: Premium activated! Ads have been removed.

data.name: PurchaseFailedMessage
data.value: The purchase could not be completed. Please try again.

data.name: PurchaseRestored
data.value: Your premium purchase has been restored.

data.name: NoPurchasesMessage
data.value: No previous purchases were found to restore.

data.name: NoPurchasesFound
data.value: No previous purchases were found to restore.

data.name: ScoresClearedDone
data.value: All high scores have been cleared.

data.name: PremiumDescription
data.value: Remove all ads and support development

data.name: HowToPlayDesc
data.value: Place bombs to destroy blocks and enemies. Find the exit to complete the level. Collect power-ups to become stronger!

data.name: ControlsHelpDesc
data.value: Use the joystick to move. Tap the bomb button to place a bomb. You can change controls in Settings.

data.name: TipsDesc
data.value: • Don't trap yourself with your own bombs! • Watch the timer - Pontans spawn when time runs out! • Kill all enemies to reveal the exit. • Collect power-ups to increase bomb count and range.

data.name: Enemy_Ballom_Desc
data.value: Slow and easy to avoid. 100 points.

data.name: Enemy_Kondoria_Desc
data.value: Very slow but can walk through walls! 1,000 points.

data.name: Enemy_Pontan_Desc
data.value: Very fast, walks through walls! 8,000 points.

data.name: PowerUp_LineBomb_Desc
data.value: Place a line of bombs at once

data.name: PowerUpBoostDesc
data.value: Watch a video to get a random power-up boost!

data.name: SkipLevelInfo
data.value: Level will be completed with 1 star

data.name: ScoreDoubleDesc
data.value: Watch a video to double your score

data.name: AdVideoNotAvailableMessage
data.value: No ad video is currently available. Please try again later.

data.name: AchNoDamageDesc
data.value: Complete a level without taking damage

data.name: AchEfficientDesc
data.value: Complete a level with 3 or fewer bombs

data.name: AchSpeedrunDesc
data.value: Complete a level with 60+ seconds remaining

data.name: TutorialMove
data.value: Move your character with the controls

data.name: TutorialBomb
data.value: Tap the bomb button to place a bomb

data.name: TutorialHide
data.value: Take cover! The bomb is about to explode!

data.name: TutorialDefeatEnemies
data.value: Defeat all enemies to reveal the exit

data.name: TutorialExit
data.value: Find the exit to complete the level

data.name: UpgradeShieldStartDesc
data.value: Start with a shield that absorbs one enemy hit

data.name: DiscoverKickDesc
data.value: Kick bombs in your movement direction!

data.name: DiscoverLinebombDesc
data.value: Place all bombs in a line!

data.name: DiscoverPowerbombDesc
data.value: One mega bomb with maximum range!

data.name: DiscoverIceDesc
data.value: Slippery ground - you slide on ice!

data.name: DiscoverLavacrackDesc
data.value: Periodic lava damage - watch the glow!

data.name: Mechanic_Ice_Desc
data.value: Slippery ground that makes you slide

data.name: Mechanic_Conveyor_Desc
data.value: Pushes players and enemies in arrow direction

data.name: Mechanic_LavaCrack_Desc
data.value: Periodic lava eruptions that damage everyone

data.name: NearMissStars
data.value: Only {0} more points for the next star!

data.name: AchCombo3Desc
data.value: Get a x3 combo or higher

data.name: AchDailyStreak7Desc
data.value: Complete 7 daily challenges in a row

data.name: MotivationTryAgain
data.value: Try again, you can do it!

data.name: UpgradeFireBombDesc
data.value: Creates lava zones for 3s. 3 per level.

data.name: UpgradeStickyBombDesc
data.value: Slows enemies, chains other bombs. 3 per level.

data.name: QuickPlaySeedHint
data.value: Share the seed to play the same level

data.name: BombSmokeDesc
data.value: Creates a smoke cloud that confuses enemies for 4s

data.name: BombLightningDesc
data.value: Lightning strikes 3 nearest enemies through walls

data.name: BombPoisonDesc
data.value: Creates poison zones that damage enemies over time

data.name: BombTimeWarpDesc
data.value: Slows everything in the blast zone for 5s

data.name: BombMirrorDesc
data.value: Explosion copies in opposite direction with double range

data.name: BombVortexDesc
data.value: Spiral explosion covering more cells than normal

data.name: BombPhantomDesc
data.value: Explosion passes through one indestructible wall

data.name: BombBlackHoleDesc
data.value: Sucks enemies in for 3s, then explodes

data.name: DeckSelectCardHint
data.value: Select a card on the left

data.name: CardIceBombDesc
data.value: Freezes enemies in the blast zone for 3s

data.name: CardFireBombDesc
data.value: Creates lava cells that deal damage over time

data.name: CardStickyBombDesc
data.value: Sticks to walls and triggers chain reactions

data.name: CardSmokeBombDesc
data.value: Creates a smoke cloud that confuses enemies for 4s

data.name: CardLightningBombDesc
data.value: Lightning jumps to 3 nearest enemies, ignoring walls

data.name: CardGravityBombDesc
data.value: Pulls all enemies within 3 cells toward the center

data.name: CardPoisonBombDesc
data.value: Creates poison cells that damage enemies who enter

data.name: CardTimeWarpBombDesc
data.value: Slows everything in radius to 50% for 5s

data.name: CardMirrorBombDesc
data.value: Explosion mirrors in opposite direction, doubling range

data.name: CardVortexBombDesc
data.value: Spiral explosion hits more cells than normal

data.name: CardPhantomBombDesc
data.value: Explosion passes through one indestructible wall

data.name: CardNovaBombDesc
data.value: 360-degree explosion hitting ALL cells in range, drops a PowerUp

data.name: CardBlackHoleBombDesc
data.value: Creates a black hole that pulls enemies in for 3s, then explodes

data.name: TrailDustDesc
data.value: Leaves a cloud of dust behind you

data.name: TrailSmokeDesc
data.value: Wisps of smoke follow your path

data.name: TrailElectricDesc
data.value: Crackling lightning sparks in your path

data.name: TrailPlasmaDesc
data.value: Glowing plasma orbs pulse behind you

data.name: TrailRainbowDesc
data.value: A mesmerizing rainbow follows your path

data.name: TrailVoidDesc
data.value: Dark matter from the void itself

data.name: TrailGoldenPathDesc
data.value: A shimmering golden trail of light

data.name: VictoryFrostAuraDesc
data.value: Emanate an icy aura of power

data.name: VictoryDragonRoarDesc
data.value: Roar with the power of a dragon

data.name: EnemyBallomLore
data.value: The slowest and weakest enemy. Easy to dodge but can corner you in tight spaces.

data.name: EnemyOnilLore
data.value: A fast pursuer that changes direction unpredictably. Watch out for sudden turns!

data.name: EnemyDollLore
data.value: Moves through walls as if they don't exist. Nowhere is truly safe!

data.name: EnemyMinvoLore
data.value: Fast and aggressive. Chases you relentlessly once spotted.

data.name: EnemyOvapiLore
data.value: Cunning and persistent. Can find shortcuts through the maze.

data.name: EnemyKondoriaLore
data.value: The trickiest enemy. Passes through walls and moves erratically.

data.name: EnemyPontanLore
data.value: Appears when time runs out. Extremely fast and lethal - run!

data.name: EnemyPassLore
data.value: A mysterious creature that passes through everything. Immune to walls and blocks.

data.name: EnemyTankerLore
data.value: Heavily armored! Takes two hits to defeat. Don't waste your bombs.

data.name: EnemyGhostLore
data.value: Turns invisible periodically. You can still be hit even when you can't see it!

data.name: EnemySplitterLore
data.value: Splits into two smaller enemies when destroyed. Clear the mini-splitters fast!

data.name: EnemyMimicLore
data.value: Disguised as a destructible block. Ambushes you when you get too close!

data.name: BossStoneGolemLore
data.value: An ancient guardian made of rock. Drops boulders from above and becomes faster when enraged.

data.name: BossIceDragonLore
data.value: A frozen terror with icy breath. Freezes entire rows and summons blizzards.

data.name: BossFireDemonLore
data.value: A demon lord wreathed in flames. Turns the ground into lava and strikes with fire waves.

data.name: BossShadowMasterLore
data.value: Master of darkness and deception. Teleports behind you when you least expect it.

data.name: BossFinalBossLore
data.value: The ultimate challenge. Commands all elements and cycles through every attack pattern.

data.name: PowerUpbombupLore
data.value: Place one more bomb at a time. Stack up to 8 bombs!

data.name: PowerUpfireLore
data.value: Increases explosion range by one tile. More range, more destruction!

data.name: PowerUpspeedLore
data.value: Moves faster! Can be stacked up to 3 times.

data.name: PowerUpwallpassLore
data.value: Walk through destructible blocks freely. A sneaky escape route!

data.name: PowerUpdetonatorLore
data.value: Detonate all your bombs at will! Perfect for traps and combos.

data.name: PowerUpbombpassLore
data.value: Walk safely over your own bombs. No more blocking yourself!

data.name: PowerUpflamepassLore
data.value: Walk through explosions unharmed. Become immune to your own fire!

data.name: PowerUpmysteryLore
data.value: A random power-up! Could be anything - will luck be on your side?

data.name: PowerUpkickLore
data.value: Kick bombs to slide them across the field. Great for hitting distant enemies!

data.name: PowerUplinebombLore
data.value: Place all your bombs in a line at once! Maximum coverage!

data.name: PowerUppowerbombLore
data.value: One massive explosion that covers a huge area. Uses all bomb slots!

data.name: PowerUpskullLore
data.value: Cursed! Gives a random negative effect for 10 seconds. Avoid if possible!

data.name: AchCardGoldDesc
data.value: Upgrade a card to Gold level

data.name: AchSurvivalKills50Desc
data.value: Defeat 50 enemies in a single Survival run

data.name: AchQuickPlayMaxDesc
data.value: Complete a Quick Play on difficulty 10

data.name: GemShopDescription
data.value: Purchase gems to unlock premium items faster

data.name: SkipLevelConfirmMessage
data.value: Do you really want to skip this level?

data.name: DungeonUpgradeStartBombsDesc
data.value: Start each run with extra bombs

data.name: DungeonUpgradeStartFireDesc
data.value: Start each run with extra fire range

data.name: DungeonUpgradeStartSpeedDesc
data.value: Start each run with a speed boost

data.name: DungeonUpgradeStartShieldDesc
data.value: Start each run with a shield

data.name: DungeonBuffTimeFreezeDesc
data.value: All enemies frozen for 3s at floor start

data.name: DungeonBuffGoldRushDesc
data.value: 3x coin rewards for the rest of the run

data.name: DungeonSelectNode
data.value: Tap a node to choose your path

data.name: SynergyElementalDesc
data.value: Lava slows enemies instead of hurting you
